EmailTemplate.name: Complaint Case Closure(Created by)
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Closed : {!Case.CaseNumber}
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Dear {!Case.CreatedBy} Case {!Case.CaseNumber} that has been logged by you has been closed. Please feel free to give us a call on 086 022 7232 or send us an email on absaeb@absa.co.za. Yours sincerely EBS Helpdesk
